translation.en: "You're... a... b-b...
big...
g... girl... now."
[woman] Marcy?
I gotta leave early tonight. You all right alone?
translation.ja: 先に帰るけど１人で大丈夫？

translation.en: I'm... I'm fine.
Don't forget to take your break. You work too hard.
translation.ja: 無理しないで休憩を取るのよ

translation.en: I won't. I won't.
translation.ja: わかった　休憩する

translation.en: Bye, Tory.
translation.ja: じゃあね　トーリー

translation.en: -[slapping glass] -Don't!
David gave that to me! David gave that to me!
translation.ja: デビッドがくれたのよ

translation.en: -David-- -[grunts]
Aah!
That's mine.
Holy shit.
[man] Trevor.
translation.ja: トレバー　相手が強すぎる 予定死亡時刻まで

translation.en: You stay down, man. He's better than you.
translation.ja: トレバー　相手が強すぎる

translation.en: -You can stay down, man! -Shut up!
translation.ja: 降参しろ うるせえ

translation.en: You should've stayed down.
Trevor! Trevor!
translation.ja: トレバー　大丈夫か？

translation.en: I concede the fight.
-Do we need to cut it? -Nah.
Ahh!
It's okay. It's okay. It's almost ready.
translation.ja: 待ってね　もう少しよ

translation.en: [man] Carly?
Carly?
[Carly] You're not coming in like that. You promised, Jeff.
translation.ja: 入れないわ 約束したでしょ　ジェフ

translation.en: [Jeff] Come on, Carly. Don't make me mad. I gotta take a piss.
translation.ja: 開けてくれ　小便したいんだ

translation.en: Not supposed to be here when you drink.
-[Jeff] Why is he crying? -He's just hungry.
translation.ja: 泣いてるぞ 空腹なの

translation.en: Give him something to eat!
I'm warming it up.
What is this shit?
It's baby food. He's a baby, Jeff.
translation.ja: 離乳食よ まだ赤ちゃんだから

translation.en: [Jeff] Don't talk to me like I'm an idiot.
[Jeff] This is bullshit. Yo, come on!
translation.ja: 予定死亡時刻まで 何なんだ　うるせえぞ 予定死亡時刻まで

translation.en: Hey, all you're doing is pissing me off!
translation.ja: 予定死亡時刻まで いい加減にしろ 予定死亡時刻まで

translation.en: [Jeff] Listen, I'm sorry. You make me crazy.
translation.ja: 悪かった ついカッとなって…

translation.en: You need to go.
[Jeff] All right. I'm going.
"Ruok"?
"Ru-ok"?
"Ruok..."
[mom] You're up early.
-[kissing] -The headache wake you?
The sound of birds.
[dad] Know how stupid it is to pick a fight before a game?
translation.ja: 試合前にケンカとはな

translation.en: How do you throw a football with a broken hand?
translation.ja: フットボールは できるのか？

translation.en: [mom] Doctors are more concerned with his concussion.
translation.ja: 脳震とうの方が心配だわ

translation.en: [dad] You blow your chance at a scholarship, you better start learning to flip burgers.
translation.ja: 奨学金を逃したら バイトで稼げよ

translation.en: All right. You scoot upstairs. Get ready.
translation.ja: やめてよ 早く用意しなさい 病院に行くわよ

translation.en: They wanted to see you again in the morning.
translation.ja: 早く用意しなさい 病院に行くわよ

translation.en: Thank you, Mom.
"Thank you, Mom"?
Who the hell's that?
[man] Philip Pearson?
Tried to find you at the university. I'm Detective Gower.
translation.ja: 探したよ　私はガワー刑事

translation.en: "Gower"?
[Gower] Your roommate passed away last night.
translation.ja: ルームメートが死んだ

translation.en: You don't seem surprised.
[man] It's me.
[Marcy] David? [David] Yeah.
Oh! That's... not appropriate.
translation.ja: それは 不適切だな

translation.en: Marcy, put some clothes on.
Yeah, I can't, uh... be your boyfriend, Marcy, w-we talked about this.
translation.ja: 前にも話したけど 僕は君の恋人になれないんだ

translation.en: What's that?
What happened?
[Marcy] Uh... I fell.
translation.ja: あの… 転んじゃった

translation.en: [David] And you just went home?
Oh, kiddo, are you okay? Does it hurt?
translation.ja: かわいそうに 痛くないかい？

translation.en: I'm fine.
translation.ja: かわいそうに 痛くないかい？ 大丈夫

translation.en: [David] Well, I know going to the doctor's not your favorite thing in the world, but...
translation.ja: 君が病院嫌いなのは 知ってるけど…

translation.en: That's a-- That's a nasty cut.
translation.ja: かなり ひどい傷だ

translation.en: Is this appropriate?
Appropriate? Sure.
[stammers] Maybe some underwear.
[Gower] So you skipped out?
[Philip] I just walked.
Uh-huh.
And the loaded syringe we found on the table, that wasn't meant for you?
translation.ja: テーブルの上の注射器は 君のじゃないと？

translation.en: Uh, what difference does it make?
Did Stephen inject himself, or did you do it for him?
translation.ja: スティーブンに 注射したのか？

translation.en: Because your prints were found on both syringes.
translation.ja: 注射器に君の指紋があった

translation.en: I was there, but then I-I left.
translation.ja: すぐに出てったんです

translation.en: Yeah...
because you knew he was gonna O.D.
translation.ja: 彼が死ぬと思ったから

translation.en: Yeah, you knew.
You know, a phone call to 911 could've saved his life.
translation.ja: 救急車を呼べば助けられた

translation.en: That's cold, Philip.
Either way, you have got a problem.
On top of your drug problem.
[Philip] I don't have a drug problem.
translation.ja: 依存症ではありません

translation.en: [Gower] I know who your dealer is.
translation.ja: 依存症ではありません 入手先も使用量も知ってる

translation.en: I know how much you buy.
translation.ja: 入手先も使用量も知ってる

translation.en: I know who your friends are and where you're from.
You have no idea where I'm from.
You inject somebody, they O.D., that's manslaughter.
translation.ja: 君が注射したなら 過失致死罪だ

translation.en: I have the right to court-appointed legal counsel, yes?
translation.ja: 弁護士をつけてください

translation.en: Sure you don't want to call your parents instead?
translation.ja: 親と話したくないのか？

translation.en: You think you're sick now, wait till your lawyer shows up.
translation.ja: 弁護士を呼ぶから待ってろ

translation.en: [David] I'm proud of you, you know.
What? What for?
You got knocked in the head last night, and you're...
translation.ja: 頭を打ったというのに⸺

translation.en: you know, the naked thing, that-- that was weird, but otherwise, you're handling this amazingly well.
translation.ja: 裸だったことを除けば きちんと行動してる

translation.en: Hey, it's Thursday.
It's reading-aloud day. There's no point in wasting time sitting on a bus.
translation.ja: 朗読の日だから ここで練習しよう

translation.en: It's just me. It can be anything at all.
Think I got your favorite.
"Police were forced to use tear gas
to disperse a crowd shortly after a not-guilty verdict was announced out--"
translation.ja: “警察は群衆を散らすため 催涙ガスを…”

translation.en: What?
What-- What's wrong?
You didn't answer your cell.
What did they say?
I have a concussion.
Oh, no.
Will you be able to play in the game next week?
The doctor said that... if I hadn't walked away from the fight, I might have died.
translation.ja: 危うく死ぬところだったと 医者に言われた

translation.en: Does it hurt now?
A little.
Are your folks home?
No. Why?
Oh, I don't think that we should, Rene, 'cause my concussion.
translation.ja: ダメだ　脳震とう起こしたし

translation.en: Let me make you feel better.
Look. Please, stop.
translation.ja: お願い　ちょっと待って

translation.en: -I don't think that we should. -Are you breaking up with me?
translation.ja: やめた方がいい 別れたいの？

translation.en: No!
If anything... I want to be closer to you.
translation.ja: むしろ そばにいてほしい

translation.en: There are things I don't remember.
Things about me?
It's more things about myself.
The doctor said that a concussion as bad as this can cause changes in personality and memory loss,
translation.ja: 脳震とうで 性格の変化や 記憶喪失が起きたらしい

translation.en: that the only treatment is time-- that in time I'll be the person I was before the concussion.
translation.ja: 元に戻るには時間がかかる

translation.en: I need you to help me remember who that person is.
Y-You want me to help you find yourself?
Trev... That is so beautiful.
translation.ja: それって すごくステキ

translation.en: [Trevor] Look...
You should go.
[Rene] I don't want to, but I will. That's how much I love you.
translation.ja: 残念だけど帰るわ あなたを愛してるから

translation.en: Daddy's coming.
You busy right now?
Not yet.
We just got sent a red flag.
Can't you handle it? I'm all over Jonas Walker.
translation.ja: ウォーカーの件で忙しい

translation.en: [Forbes] I'm in court today and tomorrow.
[MacLaren] What's the flag?
Potential cell. Encrypted communication in the deep web.
translation.ja: テロ組織かもな 深層ウェブで通信してる

translation.en: I have no idea what I'm looking at.
Analyst who flagged it is hoping that they're just gamers.
translation.ja: ゲーマーの仕業だといいが

translation.en: Who travel, apparently.
[Forbes] Those GPS coordinates correspond to an abandoned building downtown.
translation.ja: この座標は ある空きビルの位置だ

translation.en: [MacLaren] And what's a "T.E.L.L."?
[Forbes] I asked the same question. They ran it and nothing showed up.
translation.ja: 分析したが わからない

translation.en: Aw, shit, I'm late.
It's probably nothing, but...
Yeah, yeah. I got it. I'll let you know.
translation.ja: 俺が調べて 報告する

translation.en: Have fun in court.
[Forbes] Make sure Jonas Walker doesn't shoot anyone while I'm gone.
translation.ja: ウォーカーをよろしくな

translation.en: You didn't coach her?
translation.ja: 〝セラピスト Ａ･リー 医師 〞 教えないのに？ 〝セラピスト Ａ･リー 医師 〞 〝セラピスト Ａ･リー 医師 〞

translation.en: No amount of coaching can do that.
translation.ja: 教えても ああはならない 〝セラピスト Ａ･リー 医師 〞 教えても ああはならない

translation.en: Marcy has a significant intellectual disability.
translation.ja: マーシーには 重度の知的障害がある

translation.en: Yeah. "Had."
You want to think something wonderful's happened,
translation.ja: うれしいのは わかるけど⸺

translation.en: but no traumatic brain injury is going to increase intellectual capacity. It's just not possible.
translation.ja: 脳が損傷して 知力が上がることはない

translation.en: Which brings us back to "miracle."
[doctor] Assuming that there was a traumatic injury, likely a concussion,
translation.ja: 脳震とうのような 外傷性損傷の場合⸺

translation.en: the most common symptoms would be memory loss, change in personality--
translation.ja: 記憶喪失などは起きるけど…

translation.en: So...
What if this is the real Marcy?
Seriously?
Up until the age of 18, Marcy lived in an institution,
translation.ja: マーシーが育った施設は⸺

translation.en: one with a reputation for neglect and abuse,
translation.ja: マーシーが育った施設は⸺ 育児放棄や虐待があって 閉鎖されたの

translation.en: right up until the time it was shut down.
translation.ja: 育児放棄や虐待があって 閉鎖されたの それは初耳だ

translation.en: She doesn't talk about that.
[doctor] Maybe the "Marcy" we knew was her way of coping there, her way of making people look after her,
translation.ja: マーシーは障害を装って 人の注意を引いてたのよ

translation.en: and she just continued that behavior after her release, and when she hit her head...
translation.ja: 芝居を続けてたけど 頭を打った時…

translation.en: She just forgot who she was pretending to be? That's crazy.
translation.ja: 役柄を忘れた？　あり得ない

translation.en: [doctor] It's infinitely more possible than her I.Q. doubling overnight.
translation.ja: 急にＩＱが倍増する方が あり得ない

translation.en: I've been her caseworker since her release.
translation.ja: 僕は１年以上も 彼女の世話をしてきた

translation.en: -That was over a year ago! -My case in point.
translation.ja: 僕は１年以上も 彼女の世話をしてきた そこがポイント

translation.en: You got her a subsidized apartment, a job at the library. You see her four or five times a week--
translation.ja: 彼女は住居と仕事を与えられ あなたとも会える

translation.en: You're saying she played me?
The most innocent soul I've ever met.
Played the system. Fooled me, too.
So she could live in a flophouse full of crackheads, work nights at a library for the rest of her adult life?
translation.ja: 最低のアパートに住んで 夜の図書館で働くために？

translation.en: No, you're right. She's a mastermind.
translation.ja: すごい策略家だ まるで映画の…

translation.en: She's a James Bond villain.
translation.ja: すごい策略家だ まるで映画の… 一晩で語彙(ごい)が増えたり⸺

translation.en: [doctor] Neural pathways can't spring up overnight.
translation.ja: 一晩で語彙(ごい)が増えたり⸺ 吃音(きつおん)が直ったりはしない

translation.en: Vocabulary doesn't come out of nowhere. And what's happened to her stutter?
translation.ja: 吃音(きつおん)が直ったりはしない

translation.en: Is something wrong?
[straining to read] "You're... a...
big...
girl...
now,"
said... Mary...
Tee-- Teacher. -[panting] -[woman] Good.
[doctor] Do you remember that?
It was just a few months ago.
I don't understand.
[doctor] Neither do we. I'd like to find out what else you don't remember.
translation.ja: 私たちも わからない 記憶を確かめましょう

translation.en: It's okay... I'm here.
translation.ja: 大丈夫　僕がついてる

translation.en: [doctor] Let's start with yesterday. Where were you?
translation.ja: 昨日 あなたは どこにいたの？

translation.en: At the library.
Good.
[doctor] What did you do at the library?
I'm a librarian, so I was...
translation.ja: 図書館員なの　だから… じゃあ 本を貸し出したり 利用者の手助けをしたり？

translation.en: So you were checking books in and out, helping folks find what they were looking for?
translation.ja: じゃあ 本を貸し出したり 利用者の手助けをしたり？

translation.en: Yes.
[doctor] And can you name one of those people?
David.
Uh, to do research. He's a reporter.
translation.ja: 記者なので 調べ物があって

translation.en: Marcy, stop.
What's wrong?
You being a librarian,
me going there to do research for a newspaper I work for--
translation.ja: 僕は図書館で調べ物をする

translation.en: those are all part of a profile page that we made up.
translation.ja: 僕らが作った プロフィールの内容だ

translation.en: That's my profile.
We created it as an exercise...
so I could teach you about social media and other things about the world.
translation.ja: ＳＮＳとか社会について 学ぶためにね

translation.en: Remember?
You're not a librarian. You work there as a cleaning lady.
translation.ja: 君は図書館の清掃員だ

translation.en: I'm not a reporter. I'm your social worker.
translation.ja: 僕は記者じゃなくて 社会福祉士だ

translation.en: So... so what... you're saying is... that--
translation.ja: じゃあ私は… どうして…

translation.en: We're just trying to understand.
[doctor] Marcy?
Take it you're not "Leticia."
Wrong file.
Go ahead, have a seat.
Sit.
You look like shit, Philip. When was the last time you hit?
translation.ja: 禁断症状か 最後はいつ打った？

translation.en: -I don't use drugs. -Come on, man.
You don't have to pretend. I know all about addiction.
translation.ja: 大丈夫　中毒患者の気持ちは よくわかる

translation.en: Trust me. Mine's just legal.
translation.ja: 大丈夫　中毒患者の気持ちは よくわかる 俺のは合法だが

translation.en: Have they talked to you at all about the methadone program they got going on?
translation.ja: メタドン･プログラムの話は 聞いたか？

translation.en: -What is it? -Methadone?
[Philip] Your addiction.
Is it gambling?
Cigarettes.
Look, I'm just trying to be simpatico here. Don't be a dick.
translation.ja: こっちは真剣に話してんだ

translation.en: I apologize.
We're gonna plea. You'll end up doing some time. There's no way around that.
translation.ja: 罪を認めて減刑してもらう

translation.en: They got you two ways, all right?
translation.ja: やり方は２つだ　いいか？

translation.en: But, in the meantime--
Are you bound by attorney-client privilege?
Can you guarantee your confidence if I tell you information that can help us both?
translation.ja: 秘密を守るなら 僕らに有益な情報を教える

translation.en: Absolutely. What?
translation.ja: もちろんだ　言えよ

translation.en: I'm so sorry.
Come on, you love...
You love making up after we fight.
That wasn't a fight. You struck me. If I hadn't demanded you leave, you would've struck me again.
translation.ja: ケンカじゃない 何度も殴られるところだった

translation.en: From now on, you'll be allowed to see your son once a day for one hour, time to be arranged.
translation.ja: 今後は１日に１時間だけ 子どもに会わせる

translation.en: I see him when I wanna see him.
translation.ja: 好きな時に会いに来る

translation.en: Also, you'll provide proper financial support.
translation.ja: それと 経済的援助も 忘れないで

translation.en: Okay. Okay, okay. I get it.
translation.ja: よし　よくわかった

translation.en: Let me make it up to you.
What do you want me to do?
Change Jeffrey's diaper.
Hey! Phil!
You got out quick. What'd they tell you?
translation.ja: もう釈放か　何て言われた？

translation.en: They didn't say anything. They just let me go.
Come here, come here. Come here for a sec.
How did you know?
Come on, man. Three horses? Three races, three different cities-- all 20 to one or better?
translation.ja: ３ヵ所の競馬場のレースで すべて大穴狙いだ

translation.en: The bets were so stupid, I had to go to three bookies. I wouldn't have done it if you hadn't fronted the cash advance.
translation.ja: 先にカネをもらわなきゃ 買う気になれなかった

translation.en: It's all here, by the way, with interest. Credit card's in there.
translation.ja: 利子をつけて返す クレジットカードは中だ

translation.en: Go ahead. Take it. Come on, come on.
translation.ja: 持ってけ　早くしろ

translation.en: You gotta tell me.
Do I still have attorney-client privilege?
Yeah, sure, whatever. Yep. Yep.
I'm from the future.
Okay, I get it, you can't tell me.
But Phil... you're gonna need me.
translation.ja: だが お前には俺が必要だ

translation.en: The cops are gonna be all over you. We gotta look after each other here. All right?
translation.ja: 警察がつきまとうぞ 助け合おう

translation.en: Oh, speaking of which--
There's something extra in there for you, from the lock-up.
translation.ja: 留置場の土産も入れといたぞ

translation.en: Just a little taste so you don't get sick.
translation.ja: 体のために少し打っとけ

translation.en: David?
There she is.
What happened?
[David] Dr. Lee says you had a seizure.
It's the diminished capacity. There's too much pre-existing damage.
translation.ja: 既存の損傷が 大きすぎるんだわ

translation.en: What?
How did I get--?
We had to take you to the hospital.
You've been out of it all day. Soon as you feel up to it, they wanna run tests--
translation.ja: 落ち着いたら 詳しく検査してもらおう

translation.en: -No, please. -It's not up to me.
I can't be in the hospital.
-[David] Marcy. -Listen to me.
translation.ja: マーシー 聞いて　私には 大事な仕事があるの

translation.en: I have important work to do.
translation.ja: 聞いて　私には 大事な仕事があるの

translation.en: At the library?
No, not at the library.
This is all happening for a reason.
Okay.
How about I go get the doctor and we can talk about this?
translation.ja: じゃあ 担当医に 相談してみよう

translation.en: Thank you.
[David] Okay.
-Forbes. -[MacLaren] Hey.
How's Judge What's-His-Nuts?
translation.ja: よう　裁判官の様子は？

translation.en: Still an asshole. How's our potential shooter?
translation.ja: 相変わらずクソだ ウォーカーは？

translation.en: Jonas Walker hasn't left his house in a week. Starting to think we're wasting our time on that one.
translation.ja: ずっと家にいる 見張ってもムダかもな

translation.en: Our chatroom, on the other hand,
has been filling up all day with the same weird messages. I.P.s all over town.
translation.ja: 同じメッセージが 街中を飛び交ってる

translation.en: You think it's something?
Gotta admit, it's making me curious.
translation.ja: ああ　興味が湧いてきた

translation.en: The one who set up the chatroom was arrested and released on a technicality.
translation.ja: サイトの主は逮捕後に 釈放された

translation.en: Might save time if you contact the arresting officer.
translation.ja: 担当刑事と話をするか？

translation.en: Name's Gower.
Okay. Bright and early.
translation.ja: 明朝 電話してみる

translation.en: Marcy, what're you doing here? I was at your apartment! I've been worried!
translation.ja: ここで何してる 心配してたんだぞ

translation.en: I didn't know where else to go.
What is going on?
Tell me.
I can't.
A mistake's been made, and I'm not sure how to correct it.
translation.ja: 手違いがあって困ってる

translation.en: I don't even know if it can be.
Just... know that I'm playing a small part in something that's important.
translation.ja: とにかく 私には重要な任務があるの

translation.en: Well, what does that even mean?
[Marcy] I couldn't explain it if I tried.
Please... just trust me anyway.
translation.ja: お願い 私を信じて

translation.en: [MacLaren] Morning. Sorry to bother you so early. I'm Special Agent Grant MacLaren with the FBI.
translation.ja: 早朝に失礼します ＦＢＩのマクラーレンです

translation.en: FBI? Really?
Really.
A message was sent from this I.P. address-- that just means one of the computers in your house--
translation.ja: お宅のパソコンの ＩＰアドレスから⸺

translation.en: kinda raised a flag in our system.
Please tell me this is not about Internet porn.
translation.ja: まさかポルノサイトとか？

translation.en: No. Not porn. At least, I-I don't think so.
No, this is more of a chatroom conversation.
translation.ja: ある種の チャットルームでしょう

translation.en: Ah. My son's always in those rooms.
translation.ja: それなら息子が利用してます

translation.en: Is he a gamer, by any chance? Video games?
translation.ja: ビデオゲームなんかも？

translation.en: [mom] It's all he ever does.
translation.ja: ええ　やりますけど

translation.en: That, and the other thing.
translation.ja: いろいろ やらかすんで

translation.en: When do you expect him home?
[mom] Said he'd be out late tonight with friends. Is he in any kind of trouble?
translation.ja: 今夜は遅くなるそうですけど 何か問題でも？

translation.en: Nah. I doubt it. You have a good day.
translation.ja: いや ないでしょう 失礼します

translation.en: [male student] Hey. What're you doing here?
What do you mean?
to stay home for the rest of the year.
translation.ja: しばらく休むかと思った

translation.en: And fail to graduate?
Yeah, like that was gonna happen!
Can I ask you something without telling everyone?
-Yeah. -Honestly?
-Yeah, God, what is it? -Which locker is mine?
translation.ja: ああ　何だよ 僕のロッカーは？

translation.en: You mean you got, like, brain damage?
Post-concussion syndrome.
Yeah. It's, uh... it's right here.
translation.ja: そうか　ロッカーはこっちだ

translation.en: You want me to show you the combo?
Please.
[David] Hey.
[Marcy] Why is this body always so tired?
translation.ja: この体は だるいわ

translation.en: "This body"? Well, maybe 'cause it works nights.
translation.ja: この体？ たぶん 夜勤だからだろう

translation.en: This body just made breakfast.
translation.ja: この体は朝食を作った

translation.en: That's very kind.
And you're naked again.
Okay. How about you get dressed before joining me?
translation.ja: 頼む　食卓に着く前に 服を着てくれ

translation.en: David?
If I could tell you, I would.
translation.ja: 時が来たら 話すわ

translation.en: Hey, as long as you're not an assassin or a Hollywood actress researching a character.
translation.ja: 実は暗殺者か 役作り中のハリウッド女優

translation.en: Those-- Those are the... two worst-case scenarios I came up with while I was laying awake all night.
translation.ja: これが一晩かかって考えた 最悪のシナリオだ

translation.en: [Detective Gower, over phone] Gower.
Morning. Grant MacLaren, FBI. I'm investigating a 20-year-old male you booked yesterday--
translation.ja: ＦＢＩのマクラーレンだが 昨日 逮捕された学生を…

translation.en: -Philip Pearson, yeah. -That's him.
translation.ja: フィリップ･ピアソンか

translation.en: Well, I guess you heard he won the lottery yesterday, huh?
translation.ja: そいつだ ヤツは昨日 大勝ちした

translation.en: -You had to drop the charges? -No, he won the fucking lottery.
translation.ja: 釈放されたこと？ くじを当てて ９万ドル以上も手にした

translation.en: Six numbers outta seven. 92-grand and change.
translation.ja: くじを当てて ９万ドル以上も手にした

translation.en: Lucky kid.
Not if I catch him with that bag of smack he's walking around with.
translation.ja: 今に ヤクを携帯中に 捕まえるさ

translation.en: Our system red-flagged him as a potential member of a terrorist cell.
translation.ja: テロリストの可能性がある

translation.en: I got the rest of the suspects covered,
translation.ja: 俺は他を追うので彼を頼む

translation.en: but if you could watch this one--
translation.ja: 俺は他を追うので彼を頼む ヤツがテロリストの確率は ゼロに近い

translation.en: Agent MacLaren, there's no way in hell this kid's a terrorist.
translation.ja: ヤツがテロリストの確率は ゼロに近い

translation.en: Yeah? What were the odds he was gonna win the lottery?
translation.ja: 彼が当てた くじの確率は？

translation.en: [sighs] Okay.
Keep this number and check in with me later. Tomorrow, he's all yours.
translation.ja: 今日のところは協力してくれ

translation.en: Mm! You like that, sweetie?
Yes?
Special Agent MacLaren of the FBI.
-Sorry to bother you. -"MacLaren"?
translation.ja: すみませんね マクラーレンさん ご用件は？

translation.en: How can I help you?
translation.ja: マクラーレンさん ご用件は？

translation.en: Our computer spits stuff out, we have to follow it up.
translation.ja: 通信関係の案件を調査中です

translation.en: -Do you live here alone? -With my son.
translation.ja: お独りで？ 息子がいます

translation.en: -How old is he? -Just over a year.
So, no criminal record?
Sorry.
I probably know the answer to this, but do you have plans for later tonight downtown?
translation.ja: 念のために聞きますが 今夜 中心部に行く予定は？

translation.en: No. No plans.
You don't sound very sure.
I was trying to decide if you were asking me out.
translation.ja: 私を誘ったのかと思って

translation.en: Me? I'm-- I'm busy tonight.
translation.ja: いえ　私は用事があるので

translation.en: Thanks for your time.
[Gower] Hey! Pearson!
I wonder how much smack you can buy with 90 grand.
translation.ja: ９万ドルで ヘロインを買うのか？

translation.en: The money's for something else.
Save me the trouble of following you and just tell me.
translation.ja: 尾行するのは面倒だ 白状してくれ

translation.en: I'm financing a secret hideout.
Sorry, kid, you're gonna have to do better than that.
translation.ja: もっとマシなウソをつけ

translation.en: [David] You're welcome to stay while I'm at work.
translation.ja: 仕事に行ってくる 冷蔵庫に…

translation.en: -There's nothing in the fridge-- -I'll be out before you're home.
translation.ja: 仕事に行ってくる 冷蔵庫に… あとで出かけるの

translation.en: I'd like to come back tonight, if that's all right.
translation.ja: できれば戻ってきたい

translation.en: It'll be late, though.
I could come with you.
No. No, you should stay home tonight.
translation.ja: ダメ 今夜は家にいて

translation.en: The streets won't be safe.
Wh-- What? What's gonna happen?
translation.ja: 一体 何で？ 何が起きる？

translation.en: Oh, come on, that's going too far.
-I shouldn't have said anything. -You can't expect me to--
translation.ja: 口が滑った なぜ家にいないと…

translation.en: [Marcy] I'll be back just after midnight.
You're Batgirl, aren't you?
Bye.
-[siren chirps] -Shit!
Come here.
You're welcome. Get in. Let's go. Come on.
translation.ja: 礼はいい　早く乗れ

translation.en: Had to pay a kid to dare a kid to get Gower off your ass.
translation.ja: スケボーのガキは俺が雇った

translation.en: Watching your back's getting expensive, Philip.
translation.ja: お前にはカネがかかる

translation.en: -What do you want in return? -Today's bet.
translation.ja: お前にはカネがかかる 要求は？ 勝ち馬

translation.en: I can't do it.
Yesterday, you gave me three. I'm only asking for one.
translation.ja: 昨日は教えてくれたろう？

translation.en: Yesterday was an emergency.
Today's kind of an emergency for me.
translation.ja: 今日は俺が非常事態だ

translation.en: Then you are a very bad gambler.
translation.ja: あんたはギャンブルに 向かない

translation.en: Yeah, I'm a bad gambler...
Maybe you'd like to think about it.
Get out.
[Gower] Pearson! Come here!
-Where are you going? -Out.
With that guy?
I don't have time for this.
Well, make time.
Okay! Damn it.
Last warning.
Okay.
Hey! Hey!
Pearson! Stop!
Come on! Stop!
It's a good thing you stopped, kiddo.
If I had to climb that fence, I was gonna have a heart attack.
translation.ja: 心臓発作が起きそうだ

translation.en: You're having one right now.
[Gower] Oh, shut up.
I just need to catch my breath, that's all.
translation.ja: 呼吸を整えればよくなる

translation.en: Maybe you're right. My phone-- it's in the car.
translation.ja: ダメだ　携帯が車の中にある

translation.en: -Help me. -I can't, Mr. Gower.
[Gower] Then find someone with a phone!
translation.ja: じゃ誰かを呼んでくれ

translation.en: I can't, I'm sorry.
[Gower] You can. I won't come after you, I promise.
You're supposed to die this afternoon.
[Gower] No, you don't know--
I knew the moment that I heard your name.
translation.ja: 名前を聞いてわかったけど まさか目の前で…

translation.en: -I just didn't know I'd be here. -Call 911 and go!
translation.ja: 名前を聞いてわかったけど まさか目の前で… 救急車を頼む

translation.en: Because we considered you as a host.
translation.ja: あんたは宿主の候補だった

translation.en: The heart attack was inevitable within days.
translation.ja: でも心臓発作は再発する

translation.en: No... I'm okay.
I think I'm okay.
Hello?
-[MacLaren] David Mailer? -Yeah?
translation.ja: メイラーさん？ ええ

translation.en: Special Agent Grant MacLaren with the FBI.
I came by earlier, left a card under your door.
translation.ja: お宅に名刺を残しましたが

translation.en: Oh, sorry, I didn't, uh...
translation.ja: すみません　 気づきませんでした

translation.en: -I didn't see it. -Not a problem.
translation.ja: すみません　 気づきませんでした お宅のパソコンからの通信を 捜査しています

translation.en: Just following up on a chatroom message that was sent from your I.P. address last night.
translation.ja: お宅のパソコンからの通信を 捜査しています

translation.en: You mean my computer?
Right. Tell me, do you have plans to meet anyone tonight
translation.ja: ええ　今夜 人と会う予定は？

translation.en: downtown, on the 12th floor of an abandoned building, about 11:17?
translation.ja: 11時17分頃 ダウンタウンの空きビルで

translation.en: No. Why-- Why would I do that?
I guess that means I won't be seeing you there.
translation.ja: では 行かないんですね

translation.en: I'm just thinking out loud, but sometimes I let neighbors use my Wi-Fi. Maybe that's, um--
translation.ja: 時々 近所の人に Wi-Fiを使わせるので…

translation.en: Well, that's a federal offense, Mr. Mailer.
translation.ja: 時々 近所の人に Wi-Fiを使わせるので… それは法に触れますよ

translation.en: Is it?
No. I'm kidding. Have a good evening.
translation.ja: いや冗談です　では

translation.en: No. I'm not pressing charges. I just want to know where she took it.
translation.ja: 行き先を知りたいだけだ

translation.en: Well, just check and keep your mouth shut.
All right. Thanks.
Hello?
I'm-- I'm trying to reach Detective Gower. I thought this was his--
translation.ja: ガワー刑事の 携帯の番号かと…

translation.en: Jesus, I'm sorry to hear that.
No, it's-it's not important. Um, thank you.
translation.ja: 結構です　失礼します

translation.en: Carly?
Carly?
Got you.
You're actually all here.
[Carly] We've been waiting for you.
Where's the social worker?
-David isn't one of us. -One of--?
We're travelers from the future, Agent MacLaren.
[Marcy] In our time, many years from now, humanity's been all but wiped out. We've come back to change that.
translation.ja: 人類滅亡を阻止するために 遠い未来からやってきたの

translation.en: There are thousands of travelers already here taking part.
translation.ja: すでに仲間が活動してる

translation.en: Okay, what do you say we, uh, travel downstairs
translation.ja: 別の場所に トラベルしないか？

translation.en: and talk about this somewhere else? It's not safe here.
translation.ja: 安全な場所で話をしよう

translation.en: 60 seconds.
Till what?
[Philip] In the future, we've developed a technology that allows a traveler to project his or her conscious mind into a host body
translation.ja: トラベラーが自分の意識を 宿主の体に投入するのに⸺

translation.en: by knowing the precise time, elevation, latitude, and longitude of their death.
translation.ja: 宿主が死ぬ時間 標高 緯度 経度の座標を使う

translation.en: [MacLaren] "T.E.L.L."
[Marcy] A Traveler's consciousness arrives moments before that historical time of death,
translation.ja: トラベラーの意識は 宿主の死の直前に⸺

translation.en: overriding the original host's mind,
translation.ja: 元の意識に上書きされる

translation.en: then resumes his or her life by using their knowledge of historical records and social media.
translation.ja: そしてＳＮＳなどの情報から 人生を引き継ぐ

translation.en: Okay, that's enough bullshit for now--
-30 seconds. -Wait.
Who the hell is that?
That's the body of Jonas Walker.
translation.ja: ジョナス･ウォーカーの死体

translation.en: We stopped him from going on a shooting rampage,
translation.ja: 乱射事件を食い止めた

translation.en: as you tried and failed to do, between 11:14 and 11:17.
translation.ja: 乱射事件を食い止めた ここで あなたが やり損ねたことよ

translation.en: [Trevor] 20 seconds.
[Carly] We know the events of tonight because for us, they've already happened.
translation.ja: 今夜 起きることは 把握してる

translation.en: Just as we know during a blackout,
translation.ja: 記録によれば 停電中の11時17分⸺

translation.en: at 11:17, in pursuit of Jonas Walker,
translation.ja: 記録によれば 停電中の11時17分⸺ マクラーレン捜査官は ウォーカーを追跡中に転落死

translation.en: Special Agent Grant MacLaren fell 45 meters down an open elevator shaft to his death.
translation.ja: マクラーレン捜査官は ウォーカーを追跡中に転落死

translation.en: Three seconds.
Aah!
I see we all made it.
Let's begin.
